post.title: You can now boot a Windows 95 PC inside Minecraft and play Doom on it

author.bio:
Goodbye. https://ruqqus.com/+The_Cabal/post/d9y9/i-told-you-so-all-the

Remember: History repeats, and the unaware are doomed to repeat it.
author.bio_html:
Goodbye. https://ruqqus.com/+The_Cabal/post/d9y9/i-told-you-so-all-the

Remember: History repeats, and the unaware are doomed to repeat it.

body:
It's true. Fundy's getting all this attention and virality completely illegitimately because YouTube purposely promotes him (most likely for profit), and I have all the evidence to prove it. This is almost as bad as the time they did this with that "living in a van" girl.

When I saw Fundy's numbers it made me suspicious remembering some of the shenanigans with the powermods on reddit, so I did my research and found out that Fundy is missing pretty much all the key aspects of creating a popular channel, yet all his videos somehow get suggested to everyone and generate millions of views every single time. There's boatloads of other weird things too, like how he already had pro channel art and knew exactly how to edit YT videos and had all the highest quality equipment before even making his first one.

Check my posts about it if you don't believe me. And tomorrow I will most likely be making another follow-up post comparing him to other channels that have been doing the exact same videos for much longer, yet are somehow way way smaller than him and never get suggested (thus getting much less views). If you have a legitimate explanation for Fundy after actually taking the facts into account, please tell it to me. But that would require not immediately jumping to the conclusion that me and everyone who is willing to question anything is automatically a nutcase cringey conspiracy theorist. I've been accused of being "paranoid" plenty of times and I usually end up being right in the end because most people just believe everything the higher-ups tell them and don't think about it. Most notably to those who were on reddit, everyone used to laugh their asses off at me because of how (supposedly) silly the idea of a DefaultMods cabal controlling reddit was. No one is laughing anymore. Questioning things doesn't make you a Qanon alien-invasion CERN-destroying-the-universe crackhead.
body_html:
It's true. Fundy's getting all this attention and virality completely illegitimately because YouTube purposely promotes him (most likely for profit), and I have all the evidence to prove it. This is almost as bad as the time they did this with that "living in a van" girl.

When I saw Fundy's numbers it made me suspicious remembering some of the shenanigans with the powermods on reddit, so I did my research and found out that Fundy is missing pretty much all the key aspects of creating a popular channel, yet all his videos somehow get suggested to everyone and generate millions of views every single time. There's boatloads of other weird things too, like how he already had pro channel art and knew exactly how to edit YT videos and had all the highest quality equipment before even making his first one.

Check my posts about it if you don't believe me. And tomorrow I will most likely be making another follow-up post comparing him to other channels that have been doing the exact same videos for much longer, yet are somehow way way smaller than him and never get suggested (thus getting much less views). If you have a legitimate explanation for Fundy after actually taking the facts into account, please tell it to me. But that would require not immediately jumping to the conclusion that me and everyone who is willing to question anything is automatically a nutcase cringey conspiracy theorist. I've been accused of being "paranoid" plenty of times and I usually end up being right in the end because most people just believe everything the higher-ups tell them and don't think about it. Most notably to those who were on reddit, everyone used to laugh their asses off at me because of how (supposedly) silly the idea of a DefaultMods cabal controlling reddit was. No one is laughing anymore. Questioning things doesn't make you a Qanon alien-invasion CERN-destroying-the-universe crackhead.

post.title: You can now boot a Windows 95 PC inside Minecraft and play Doom on it

author.bio:
Goodbye. https://ruqqus.com/+The_Cabal/post/d9y9/i-told-you-so-all-the

Remember: History repeats, and the unaware are doomed to repeat it.
author.bio_html:
Goodbye. https://ruqqus.com/+The_Cabal/post/d9y9/i-told-you-so-all-the

Remember: History repeats, and the unaware are doomed to repeat it.

body: That one Minecraft YouTuber who made the impossible/easy difficulty datapacks and got super popular because that's *so* original. He also did a "Minecraft in Minecraft" video that converted his monitor pixels into minecraft blocks, which is cool and all, but it got a lot more attention than boatloads of people who actually simulated Minecraft with command blocks and such, among other unbelievable feats. And now almost everyone in the Minecraft community is part of Fundy's personality cult it seems, and I can't figure out what it is that makes them do nothing but worship him now.
body_html: That one Minecraft YouTuber who made the impossible/easy difficulty datapacks and got super popular because that's so original. He also did a "Minecraft in Minecraft" video that converted his monitor pixels into minecraft blocks, which is cool and all, but it got a lot more attention than boatloads of people who actually simulated Minecraft with command blocks and such, among other unbelievable feats. And now almost everyone in the Minecraft community is part of Fundy's personality cult it seems, and I can't figure out what it is that makes them do nothing but worship him now.
